reviewText:
Excellant movies.
  Three  Paul Newman movies and each one on a separate disc.  The Verdict.
The Hustler.  Two of his best performances . AND The Terrace  ..
an earlier film with Joanne Woodward.
We enjoyed all of these wonderful characters and fine stories.
So three movies in one. It's a great deal. I love Paul Newman and so to get three movies for the price of one is a cool deal.
